verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Avenge <S%H5358><s%> <S%H5360><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the Midianites: <S%H4084><s%> afterward <S%H310><s%> shalt thou be gathered <S%H622><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thy people. <S%H5971><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Arm <S%H2502><s%> some <S%H376><s%> of yourselves <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> unto the war, <S%H6635><s%> and let them go <S%H1961><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Midianites, <S%H4080><s%> and avenge <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5360><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>

Of every tribe a thousand, <S%H4294><s%> <S%H505><s%> <S%H4294><s%> <S%H505><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> shall ye send <S%H7971><s%> to the war. <S%H6635><s%>

So there were delivered <S%H4560><s%> out of the thousands <S%H4480><s%> <S%H505><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> of every tribe, <S%H4294><s%> twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> for war. <S%H6635><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> them to the war, <S%H6635><s%> a thousand <S%H505><s%> of every tribe <S%H4294><s%> them, and Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> to the war, <S%H6635><s%> with the holy <S%H6944><s%> instruments, <S%H3627><s%> and the trumpets <S%H2689><s%> to blow <S%H8643><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

And they warred <S%H6633><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the Midianites, <S%H4080><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and they slew <S%H2026><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the males. <S%H2145><s%>

And they slew <S%H2026><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the rest of them that were slain; <S%H2491><s%> namely, <S%H853><s%> Evi, <S%H189><s%> and Rekem, <S%H7552><s%> and Zur, <S%H6698><s%> and Hur, <S%H2354><s%> and Reba, <S%H7254><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of Midian: <S%H4080><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> also the son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> they slew <S%H2026><s%> with the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took all <S%H853><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> captives, <S%H7617><s%> and their little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and took the spoil <S%H962><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> their cattle, <S%H929><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their flocks, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their goods. <S%H2428><s%>
And they burnt <S%H8313><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> their cities <S%H5892><s%> wherein they dwelt, <S%H4186><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> their goodly castles, <S%H2918><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>
And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the prey, <S%H4455><s%> both of men <S%H120><s%> and of beasts. <S%H929><s%>

And they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> the captives, <S%H7628><s%> and the prey, <S%H4455><s%> and the spoil, <S%H7998><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the plains <S%H6160><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are by <S%H5921><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> near Jericho. <S%H3405><s%>

And Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> them without <S%H413><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was wroth <S%H7107><s%> with <S%H5921><s%> the officers <S%H6485><s%> of the host, <S%H2428><s%> with the captains <S%H8269><s%> over thousands, <S%H505><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> over hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> which came <S%H935><s%> from the battle. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6635><s%> <S%H4421><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, Have ye saved all the women alive? <S%H2421><s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5347><s%>

Behold, <S%H2005><s%> these <S%H2007><s%> caused <S%H1961><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> through the counsel <S%H1697><s%> of Balaam, <S%H1109><s%> to commit <S%H4560><s%> trespass <S%H4604><s%> against the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%> of Peor, <S%H6465><s%> and there was <S%H1961><s%> a plague <S%H4046><s%> among the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore kill <S%H2026><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> male <S%H2145><s%> among the little ones, <S%H2945><s%> and kill <S%H2026><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> that hath known <S%H3045><s%> man <S%H376><s%> by lying <S%H4904><s%> with him. <S%H2145><s%>

But all <S%H3605><s%> the women <S%H802><s%> children, <S%H2945><s%> that <S%H834><s%> have not <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> a man <S%H2145><s%> by lying <S%H4904><s%> with him, keep alive <S%H2421><s%> for yourselves.

And do ye <S%H859><s%> abide <S%H2583><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp <S%H4264><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> whosoever <S%H3605><s%> hath killed <S%H2026><s%> any person, <S%H5315><s%> and whosoever <S%H3605><s%> hath touched <S%H5060><s%> any slain, <S%H2491><s%> purify <S%H2398><s%> both yourselves <S%H859><s%> and your captives <S%H7628><s%> on the third <S%H7992><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And purify <S%H2398><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your raiment, <S%H899><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is made <S%H3627><s%> of skins, <S%H5785><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of goats' <S%H5795><s%> hair, and all <S%H3605><s%> things <S%H3627><s%> made of wood. <S%H6086><s%>

And Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> which went <S%H935><s%> to the battle, <S%H4421><s%> This <S%H2063><s%> is the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the law <S%H8451><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses; <S%H4872><s%>

Only <S%H389><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gold, <S%H2091><s%> and the silver, <S%H3701><s%> <S%H853><s%> the brass, <S%H5178><s%> <S%H853><s%> the iron, <S%H1270><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tin, <S%H913><s%> and the lead, <S%H5777><s%>

Every <S%H3605><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> may abide <S%H935><s%> the fire, <S%H784><s%> ye shall make it go <S%H5674><s%> through the fire, <S%H784><s%> and it shall be clean: <S%H2891><s%> nevertheless <S%H389><s%> it shall be purified <S%H2398><s%> with the water <S%H4325><s%> of separation: <S%H5079><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> abideth <S%H935><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> ye shall make go <S%H5674><s%> through the water. <S%H4325><s%>

And ye shall wash <S%H3526><s%> your clothes <S%H899><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> and ye shall be clean, <S%H2891><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> ye shall come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Take <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the prey <S%H4455><s%> that was taken, <S%H7628><s%> both of man <S%H120><s%> and of beast, <S%H929><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the congregation: <S%H5712><s%>

And divide <S%H2673><s%> <S%H853><s%> the prey <S%H4455><s%> into two parts; between <S%H996><s%> them that took <S%H8610><s%> the war <S%H4421><s%> upon them, who went out <S%H3318><s%> to battle, <S%H6635><s%> and between <S%H996><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation: <S%H5712><s%>

And levy <S%H7311><s%> a tribute <S%H4371><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> which went out <S%H3318><s%> to battle: <S%H6635><s%> one <S%H259><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> of five <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> both of <S%H4480><s%> the persons, <S%H120><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the beefs, <S%H1241><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the asses, <S%H2543><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the sheep: <S%H6629><s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> it of their half, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4276><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> it unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> for a heave offering <S%H8641><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel's <S%H3478><s%> half, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4276><s%> thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> portion <S%H270><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> fifty, <S%H2572><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the persons, <S%H120><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the beefs, <S%H1241><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the asses, <S%H2543><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> the flocks, <S%H6629><s%> of all manner <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of beasts, <S%H929><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> which keep <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the booty, <S%H4455><s%> being the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the prey <S%H957><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the men <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> had caught, <S%H962><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seventy <S%H7657><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%>
And threescore and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H7657><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> beefs, <S%H1241><s%>
And threescore <S%H8346><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> asses, <S%H2543><s%>

And thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> persons <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%> in all, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5315><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> women <S%H802><s%> that <S%H834><s%> had not <S%H3808><s%> known <S%H3045><s%> man by lying with <S%H4904><s%> him. <S%H2145><s%>

And the half, <S%H4275><s%> which was the portion <S%H2506><s%> of them that went out <S%H3318><s%> to war, <S%H6635><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sheep: <S%H6629><s%>

And the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> tribute <S%H4371><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the sheep <S%H6629><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore and fifteen. <S%H2568><s%> <S%H7657><s%>

And the beefs <S%H1241><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand; <S%H505><s%> of which the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> tribute <S%H4371><s%> was threescore and twelve. <S%H8147><s%> <S%H7657><s%>

And the asses <S%H2543><s%> were thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred; <S%H3967><s%> of which the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> tribute <S%H4371><s%> was threescore <S%H8346><s%> and one. <S%H259><s%>

And the persons <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%> were sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand; <S%H505><s%> of which the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> tribute <S%H4371><s%> was thirty <S%H7970><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> persons. <S%H5315><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> <S%H853><s%> the tribute, <S%H4371><s%> which was the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> heave offering, <S%H8641><s%> unto Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel's <S%H3478><s%> half, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4276><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> divided <S%H2673><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that warred, <S%H6633><s%>

(Now the half <S%H4275><s%> that pertained unto the congregation <S%H5712><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%>
And thirty <S%H7970><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> beefs, <S%H1241><s%>
And thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> asses <S%H2543><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%>
And sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> persons;) <S%H5315><s%> <S%H120><s%>

Even of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel's <S%H3478><s%> half, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4276><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> one <S%H259><s%> <S%H853><s%> portion <S%H270><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> fifty, <S%H2572><s%> both of <S%H4480><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and gave <S%H5414><s%> them unto the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> which kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the officers <S%H6485><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were over thousands <S%H505><s%> of the host, <S%H6635><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands, <S%H505><s%> and captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> came near <S%H7126><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses: <S%H4872><s%>

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Thy servants <S%H5650><s%> have taken <S%H5375><s%> <S%H853><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are under our charge, <S%H3027><s%> and there lacketh <S%H6485><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one man <S%H376><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> us.

We have therefore brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H853><s%> an oblation <S%H7133><s%> for the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> what <S%H834><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> hath gotten, <S%H4672><s%> of jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold, <S%H2091><s%> chains, <S%H685><s%> and bracelets, <S%H6781><s%> rings, <S%H2885><s%> earrings, <S%H5694><s%> and tablets, <S%H3558><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for <S%H5921><s%> our souls <S%H5315><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> them, even all <S%H3605><s%> wrought <S%H4639><s%> jewels. <S%H3627><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> of the offering <S%H8641><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they offered up <S%H7311><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands, <S%H505><s%> and of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> sixteen <S%H8337><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> shekels. <S%H8255><s%>
(For the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H6635><s%> had taken spoil, <S%H962><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> for himself.)

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the gold <S%H2091><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the captains <S%H8269><s%> of thousands <S%H505><s%> and of hundreds, <S%H3967><s%> and brought <S%H935><s%> it into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> for a memorial <S%H2146><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
